ai.summary: Culliaghs Walk in Crom is a gentle 3.2 km circular hike in the UK, suitable for families and walkers of all abilities. The route offers easy footing, mild elevation, and pleasant countryside views around Crom, with opportunities for wildlife spotting and countryside scenery.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly well-defined paths with some grassy sections and a few gravel stretches. The walk has gentle inclines and flat sections, with occasional muddy patches in wet weather. Expect open fields and hedgerows along the route.
ai.safety_notes: Weather can change quickly in the UK; check the forecast before you go. Wear sturdy footwear and weather-appropriate clothing. Stay on marked paths, bring a map or GPS, and carry water. Take care in open sections exposed to wind, and watch for livestock or gates. Let someone know your plans if walking alone.
recommended_gear: Weather-appropriate clothing including a waterproof layer
Map and/or GPS (or fully charged phone with offline maps)
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn are typically the best seasons for this walk, offering milder weather and longer daylight; winter walks are possible with proper winter clothing and footwear.

seo.title: Culliaghs Walk, Crom – Easy 3.2 km Circular Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Explore Culliaghs Walk in Crom, UK. A short, easy 3.2 km circular hike with gentle terrain, ideal for families. Practical tips, terrain, safety notes, and gear.
